title: What happened
body:
Patched 6.20 yesterday, and since then everytime i get into a game my laptop just freezes and stops working altogether. Had to manually restart and after reconnecting it seems fine. Right now this happens every game i play, wtf rito?
EDIT: i turned off Game DVR, seems to be better now, game is still a little unstable but definitely better, at least I can run music in the background now so good enough for me

replies.body:
There was a Windows 10 update that was automatically rolled out to everyone that enabled a feature called *Game DVR* inside the Windows Game Bar. This has been causing PC freezes and fps issues for some players. I recommend [disabling this feature entirely](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves the issue for you.

Let me know if this helped.
A lot better now, thanks bro

Hello, are you a Windows 10 user that also got the W10 Anniversary update? Strange buzzing sound?
Try this:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/X6sPFPu8-fps-drops-and-crashes-after-the-windows-10-anniversary-update
